meaning: Mr., hall, mansion, palace, temple, lord

onyomiExamples.meaning: palace, hall, shrine, temple, sanctuary, hall of fame
your Highness, his Highness, her Highness

kunyomiExamples.meaning: nobleman, dignitary, lord, feudal lord (of the Edo period), daimyō, man brought up away from the world, arrogant man with little knowledge of the ways of the world
current master, father of one's current master, minister (of government), noble, nobleman's residence
young lord, successor of one's current lord
